mapper.select: SELECT * FROM vilce.wage_order ORDER BY order_time DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT vilce.eid.nextval AS eid FROM dual
INSERT INTO vilce.wage_order (EID,CODE,NAME,ORDER_TIME,BASIC_WAGE,JOB_WAGE,BENCHMARK_PERFORMANCE,STANDARD_SALARY,FIXED_ALLOWANCE,TECHNICAL_EXPERT_ALLOWANCE, RANK_ALLOWANCE,FIXED_BONUS,FLOATING_BONUS,TOTAL_WAGES,EXAMINATION_ALLOWANCE,ON_OFF_AFTER_LEAVE_PAY,PERFORMANCE_ADJUSTMENT, FLOATING_ALLOWANCE,DAILY_OVERTIME,SICK_LEAVE_DEDUCTION,LATE_ABSENTEE_DEDUCTIONS,OTHER_INCREASE_OR_DECREASE, MATERNITY_LEAVE_DEDUCTIONS,FLOATING_BONUS2,RECOMMENDATION_AWARD,PRODUCT_EXPERIENCE_BONUS,PAYABLE,SOCIAL_SECURITY,PROVIDENT_FUND, POST_INSURANCE_PAY,EDUCATION_FOR_CHILDREN,HOME_LOAN,HOUSING_RENT,SUPPORT_FOR_THE_ELDERLY,CONTINUING_EDUCATION,DEFERRED_INSURANCE, TAX,PAID_WAGES) VALUES (#{eid},#{code},#{name},#{order_time},#{basic_wage},#{job_wage},#{benchmark_performance},#{standard_salary},#{fixed_allowance}, #{technical_expert_allowance},#{rank_allowance},#{fixed_bonus},#{floating_bonus},#{total_wages},#{examination_allowance}, #{on_off_after_leave_pay},#{performance_adjustment},#{floating_allowance},#{daily_overtime},#{sick_leave_deduction}, #{late_absentee_deductions},#{other_increase_or_decrease},#{maternity_leave_deductions},#{floating_bonus2},#{recommendation_award}, #{product_experience_bonus},#{payable},#{social_security},#{provident_fund},#{post_insurance_pay},#{education_for_children}, #{home_loan},#{housing_rent},#{support_for_the_elderly},#{continuing_education},#{deferred_insurance},#{tax},#{paid_wages})
mapper.update: UPDATE vilce.wage_order SET code=#{code}, name=#{name}, order_time=#{order_time}, basic_wage=#{basic_wage}, job_wage=#{job_wage}, benchmark_performance=#{benchmark_performance}, standard_salary=#{standard_salary}, fixed_allowance=#{fixed_allowance}, technical_expert_allowance=#{technical_expert_allowance}, rank_allowance=#{rank_allowance}, fixed_bonus=#{fixed_bonus}, floating_bonus=#{floating_bonus}, total_wages=#{total_wages}, examination_allowance=#{examination_allowance}, on_off_after_leave_pay=#{on_off_after_leave_pay}, performance_adjustment=#{performance_adjustment}, floating_allowance=#{floating_allowance}, daily_overtime=#{daily_overtime}, sick_leave_deduction=#{sick_leave_deduction}, late_absentee_deductions=#{late_absentee_deductions}, other_increase_or_decrease=#{other_increase_or_decrease}, maternity_leave_deductions=#{maternity_leave_deductions}, floating_bonus2=#{floating_bonus2}, recommendation_award=#{recommendation_award}, product_experience_bonus=#{product_experience_bonus}, payable=#{payable}, social_security=#{social_security}, provident_fund=#{provident_fund}, post_insurance_pay=#{post_insurance_pay}, education_for_children=#{education_for_children}, home_loan=#{home_loan}, housing_rent=#{housing_rent}, support_for_the_elderly=#{support_for_the_elderly}, continuing_education=#{continuing_education}, deferred_insurance=#{deferred_insurance}, tax=#{tax}, paid_wages=#{paid_wages} WHERE eid=#{eid}
